class.name: TrueElementHandler
class.javadoc:
This class is intended to handle <true> element. This element specifies {@code true} value. It should not contain body or inner elements. For example:
                  <true/>
is equivalent to {@code true} in Java code.

The following atribute is supported:

id
the identifier of the variable that is intended to store the result
1.7 Sergey A. Malenkov

Returns {@code Boolean.TRUE}as a value of <true> element.
{@code Boolean.TRUE} by default
